title: Simple Checkout option added Magento site
snippet:
I want an option for customers to check out for local pickup/pay on pickup. All I need to collect from them is first name, phone number & email. I still need the sell to be recorded on the site. Then, I need them to be able to select a pick up date and time. 

That simple

The site you will be working on is www.thedivinedeal.com
